column2: "It looks like the Fordoran with two horns is male, and the Nordiran with one horn is female, Professor!"
"O-oh, so you knew?! Hans said it was classified information though..."
"I underestimated you! I once again want to learn from you, Professor!"
"Oh, that's right. This time, I'd like you to tell me the breakable places on Fordoran!"
"Alright, I'm really looking forward to it!"
